price: Fie upon you[25] and upon all that you worship besides Allah! Do you not have any sense?”
arabic: أُفّٖ لَّكُمۡ وَلِمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: [25] An expression of anger and displeasure.
